title: Tadka dhal
time: Hands-on time 25 min, simmering time 35-40 min
description: Chetna Makan’s comforting tadka dhal recipe combines lentils with turmeric and chilli in this warming vegetarian dish.
ingredients: 1 green chilli, deseeded and finely chopped
½ tsp kashmiri chilli powder (or mild chilli powder)
Handful fresh coriander, chopped, plus extra to serve

method.Step 1: Put the toor dhal into a large lidded saucepan, pour over 1.2 litres cold water, then add the salt and turmeric. Stir well and bring to the boil. Part-cover the pan and simmer for 30-35 minutes on a low heat until the lentils are tender.

method.Step 2: In another pan, heat the oil on a medium heat, then add the cumin seeds. Once they start to sizzle, add the onion, green chilli and garlic. Cook for about 5 minutes until the onion is light golden brown.

method.Step 3: Add the chilli powder and chopped coriander, then mix well. Add the cooked lentils and bring to the boil. Serve hot, sprinkled with chopped fresh coriander, with rice and yogurt.
